name: The First Responder
description:
Welcome to The First Responder! You are a firefighter and your task is to extinguish all of the fires before they burn down the building. 

Controls:

  • Move left or right: A, D, and the left and right arrow keys.
  • Jump: Use spacebar
  • Shoot water: W

Artist: Jiamei Li

Programmer: Zachary Lum
